text: Solomon uan afeziam Devitɨn arazibar gɨntɨgha, bizir a damuasa mɨkemeziba, a zurara Godɨn ofa gamir gumaziba a men ikɨzibar, ingangariba bagha me tuira. Egha a Godɨn ofa gamir gumazibar akurvagh ingangarim damuasa Livaiba vaghvagha me tuira. Ezɨ men marazi uaghan ighiabar amu Godɨn ziam fam. Livaibar ingangarir a me bagha inabaziba, me dughiabar vaghvagha dagh ami. Egha Solomon uaghan garir gumaziba men ikɨziba, a Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn tiar akabar ganasa vaghavagha me tuira. Arazir kaba, God baghavɨra itir gumazim Devit, a me mɨkeme.
